articles.title: Explained: Obstructive Sleep Apnoea, the medical condition which has been in the spotlight since Bappi Lahiri’s death - The Indian Express
articles.description: OSA is a disorder in which a person's breathing stops and starts repeatedly in their sleep. It can lead to heart attacks and strokes due to depleted oxygen levels.
